plans.progressions: {"showProgressions":true,"totalWeeks":5,"weeks":[{"week":1,"title":"Semana base","note":"Realiza el plan tal como esta escrito"},{"week":2,"title":"Estabilidad","note":"Manten series y repeticiones, mejora la tecnica"},{"week":3,"title":"Progresion de volumen","note":"Intenta anadir 1-2 repeticiones por serie si te sientes bien"},{"week":4,"title":"Carga","note":"Si completas el rango, aumenta ligeramente el peso"},{"week":5,"title":"Deload","note":"Reduce intensidad, concentrate en ejecucion"}]}
plans.name: Plan de Julio Gutierrez Morales
Plan de Julio Gutierrez Morales
plans.sessions: [{"name":"Sesión 1","items":[{"isGroup":true,"name":"Superserie 1","children":[{"id":"Decline_Supinated_Barbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_G9NpuxnNvZE","name_en":"Decline Supinated Barbell Bench Press","name_es":"Press de banca con barra declinado y agarre supinado (Decline Supinated Barbell Bench Press)","category":"Push","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","muscle_group":"Pectorales","secondary_muscles":["Hombros","Tríceps"],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Push","functional":false,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"The Decline Supinated Barbell Bench Press is an upper body pushing exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Lie decline on a bench with a supinated (reverse) grip position. Unrack the barbell, lower it to the base of your chest, and push it away until your arms are fully extended. This is one repetition.","description_es":"El press de banca con barra declinado y agarre supinado es un ejercicio de empuje para el tren superior que trabaja principalmente el pecho, los hombros y los tríceps. Acuéstate en un banco declinado con un agarre supinado (agarre inverso). Desenganche la barra, bájala hasta la base del pecho y empújala hacia arriba hasta que tus brazos estén completamente extendidos. Esta es una repetición.","aliases":["Decline Reverse Grip Bench Press","Decline Supinated Bench Press"],"tips":["Mantén los pies firmes en el suelo","Respira correctamente durante el movimiento","Usa un agarre cómodo y estable"],"common_mistakes":["Agarre demasiado estrecho o demasiado ancho","Arquear la espalda en exceso","Falta de control en la fase excéntrica"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Decline_Supinated_Barbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_G9NpuxnNvZE_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Decline_Supinated_Barbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_G9NpuxnNvZE_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G9NpuxnNvZE","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"8-10","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"25"},{"id":"Incline_Dumbbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_jMQA3XtJSgo","name_en":"Incline Dumbbell Bench Press","name_es":"Press de Banca con Mancuernas en Plano Inclinado (Incline Dumbbell Bench Press)","category":"Push","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Mancuernas","muscle_group":"Pectorales","secondary_muscles":["Deltoides","Tríceps"],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Push","functional":false,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"The Incline Dumbbell Bench Press is an upper body exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps muscles. It starts by lying on an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in each hand with a pronated grip (palms facing away from you) at chest level. Then, push the dumbbells vertically away from your chest by extending your arms until they are fully extended. Pause briefly at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position. This is one repetition.","description_es":"El Press de Banca con Mancuernas en Plano Inclinado es un ejercicio para el tren superior que trabaja principalmente los músculos del pecho, hombros y tríceps. Se inicia acostado en un banco inclinado, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre pronado (palmas mirando hacia afuera) a la altura del pecho. Luego, empuja las mancuernas verticalmente alejándolas del pecho extendiendo los brazos hasta que estén completamente extendidos. Haz una pausa breve en la parte superior, y luego baja lentamente las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial. Esta es una repetición.","aliases":["Incline DB Press","Incline Dumbbell Press"],"tips":["Exhala al empujar, inhala al bajar","Mantén la espalda plana contra el banco","Usa un agarre neutral o semipronado para reducir el estrés en los hombros"],"common_mistakes":["Arquear la espalda","Balancear las mancuernas","Usar un rango de movimiento incompleto"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Incline_Dumbbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_jMQA3XtJSgo_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Incline_Dumbbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_jMQA3XtJSgo_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jMQA3XtJSgo","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"8-10","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"50"},{"id":"Single_Dumbbell_Seated_Overhead_Tricep_Extension_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_HADoxgsslvw","name_en":"Single Dumbbell Seated Overhead Tricep Extension","name_es":"Extensión de tríceps sentado con una mancuerna por encima de la cabeza","category":"Pull","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Mancuernas","muscle_group":"Tríceps","secondary_muscles":["Antebrazo","Deltoides"],"exercise_type":"Aislado","movement_pattern":"Push","functional":false,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Sit on a bench holding a dumbbell with both hands overhead. Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending at the elbows. Engage your triceps to extend your arms and raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.","description_es":"Siéntate en un banco sosteniendo una mancuerna con ambas manos por encima de la cabeza. Baja lentamente la mancuerna detrás de tu cabeza flexionando los codos. Contrae tus tríceps para extender los brazos y levantar la mancuerna de vuelta a la posición inicial.","aliases":["Overhead Tricep Extension","Skull Crusher"],"tips":["Contrae los tríceps en la extensión","Mantén los codos fijos","Usa un agarre estrecho para mayor activación"],"common_mistakes":["Balancear la mancuerna","Usar demasiado peso","Usar movimiento de cuerpo para impulsar"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Single_Dumbbell_Seated_Overhead_Tricep_Extension_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_HADoxgsslvw_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Single_Dumbbell_Seated_Overhead_Tricep_Extension_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_HADoxgsslvw_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HADoxgsslvw","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"10-12","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"}]},{"isGroup":true,"name":"Superserie 2","children":[{"id":"Seated_Single_Arm_Arnold_Dumbbell_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_2zzkQH3kzME","name_en":"Seated Single Arm Arnold Dumbbell Press","name_es":"Press de mancuerna Arnold con un brazo sentado","category":"Push","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Mancuernas","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":["Pectoral","Tríceps"],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Push","functional":false,"plane_of_motion":"Frontal","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"The Seated Single Arm Arnold Press starts in a seated position on a bench, holding a dumbbell with a supinated grip above your chest. Press the dumbbell straight up while rotating it to a neutral grip position parallel to your legs at the top of the movement. Lower the dumbbell back to the starting position in a controlled motion. This is one repetition.","description_es":"El press de mancuerna Arnold con un brazo sentado comienza en una posición sentada en un banco, sosteniendo una mancuerna con un agarre supinado por encima del pecho. Presiona la mancuerna hacia arriba mientras la giras a una posición de agarre neutral paralela a tus piernas en la parte superior del movimiento. Baja la mancuerna de vuelta a la posición inicial de manera controlada. Esta es una repetición.","aliases":["Arnold Press","Press Arnold"],"tips":["Controla el movimiento en todo momento","Mantén una postura erguida","Usa un peso adecuado para mantener la técnica correcta"],"common_mistakes":["Falta de control en el movimiento","Mala postura","Usar demasiado peso"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Seated_Single_Arm_Arnold_Dumbbell_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_2zzkQH3kzME_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Seated_Single_Arm_Arnold_Dumbbell_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_2zzkQH3kzME_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2zzkQH3kzME","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"8-10","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"},{"id":"3_Month_Dumbbell_Skull_Crusher_v4zRczXNIBw","name_en":"3 Month Dumbbell Skull Crusher","name_es":"Extensión de tríceps con mancuernas en banco plano (3 Month Dumbbell Skull Crusher)","category":"Core","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Mancuernas","muscle_group":"Tríceps","secondary_muscles":["Antebrazos"],"exercise_type":"Aislado","movement_pattern":"Push","functional":false,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"A compound exercise that targets the triceps brachii. Performed by lying on a flat bench holding a dumbbell with both hands overhead, and lowering the weight behind the head by bending at the elbows.","description_es":"Un ejercicio compuesto que trabaja principalmente los tríceps braquiales. Se realiza acostado en un banco plano, sosteniendo una mancuerna con ambas manos por encima de la cabeza y bajando el peso detrás de la nuca flexionando los codos.","aliases":["Lying Triceps Extension","Skull Crusher"],"tips":["Mantén la espalda plana contra el banco","Mantén los codos fijos","Usa un rango de movimiento cómodo"],"common_mistakes":["Arquear la espalda","Mover los codos hacia los lados","Usar un rango de movimiento excesivo"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/3_Month_Dumbbell_Skull_Crusher_v4zRczXNIBw_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/3_Month_Dumbbell_Skull_Crusher_v4zRczXNIBw_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v4zRczXNIBw","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"10-12","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"},{"id":"Chest_Supported_Dumbbell_Lat_Kickback_BOOVTnFLDPI","name_en":"Chest Supported Dumbbell Lat Kickback","name_es":"Extensión de tríceps con mancuernas en banco inclinado (Chest Supported Dumbbell Lat Kickback)","category":"Pull","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Mancuernas","muscle_group":"Tríceps","secondary_muscles":["Deltoides posterior"],"exercise_type":"Aislado","movement_pattern":"Pull","functional":false,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Hipertrofia","description_en":"A single-arm exercise that targets the triceps brachii. Performed by lying chest-down on an incline bench and extending the arm back with a dumbbell.","description_es":"Un ejercicio de un solo brazo que se enfoca en el tríceps braquial. Se realiza acostado con el pecho sobre un banco inclinado y extendiendo el brazo hacia atrás con una mancuerna.","aliases":["Extensiones de tríceps en banco inclinado","Kickbacks de tríceps con mancuernas"],"tips":["Controlar el movimiento","Extender completamente el brazo","Mantener el cuerpo estable"],"common_mistakes":["Mover el cuerpo en lugar del brazo","Usar demasiado impulso"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Chest_Supported_Dumbbell_Lat_Kickback_BOOVTnFLDPI_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Chest_Supported_Dumbbell_Lat_Kickback_BOOVTnFLDPI_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOOVTnFLDPI","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"10-12","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"}]},{"id":"Scapular_CARs_VcIaj4GmGtg","name_en":"Scapular CARs","name_es":"Movimientos Circunducciones de la Escápula (Scapular CARs)","category":"Core","difficulty":"Principiante","equipment_type":"Peso corporal","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":["Romboides","Serrato anterior","Trapecio"],"exercise_type":"Aislado","movement_pattern":"Rotation","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Transversal","training_goal":"Movilidad","description_en":"Perform full range of motion movements with the scapulae (shoulder blades) while keeping the arms at your sides. Hold each position for 3 seconds.","description_es":"Realiza movimientos de rango de movimiento completo con las escápulas (omóplatos) mientras mantienes los brazos a los costados. Mantén cada posición durante 3 segundos.","aliases":["Scapular Depression/Elevation","Scapular Protraction/Retraction","Scapular Upward/Downward Rotation"],"tips":["Enfócate en el movimiento de las escápulas","Mantén los hombros relajados","Respira de forma controlada"],"common_mistakes":["Movimientos incompletos","Tensión excesiva en el cuello"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Scapular_CARs_VcIaj4GmGtg_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Scapular_CARs_VcIaj4GmGtg_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VcIaj4GmGtg","gif_url":null,"sets":2,"reps":"10-15","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"}]},{"name":"Sesión 2","items":[{"isGroup":true,"name":"Superserie 1","children":[{"id":"Swiss_Ball_Deadbug_IZE8woIduAU","name_en":"Swiss Ball Deadbug","name_es":"Bicho muerto con pelota suiza (Swiss Ball Deadbug)","category":"Core","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Mancuernas","equipment_specific":"Pelota suiza","muscle_group":"Core","secondary_muscles":[],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Core","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Transversal","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Lie on your back with your arms extended overhead and legs raised, balancing a dumbbell on your shins. Keeping your arms and legs straight, alternately lower your right arm and left leg towards the floor, then return to the starting position. Repeat on the opposite side.","description_es":"Acuéstate boca arriba con los brazos extendidos por encima de la cabeza y las piernas levantadas, equilibrando una mancuerna sobre las espinillas. Manteniendo los brazos y las piernas rectos, baja alternativamente el brazo derecho y la pierna izquierda hacia el suelo, luego regresa a la posición inicial. Repite del lado opuesto.","aliases":[],"tips":[],"common_mistakes":[],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Swiss_Ball_Deadbug_IZE8woIduAU_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Swiss_Ball_Deadbug_IZE8woIduAU_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IZE8woIduAU","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"},{"id":"Ab_Wheel_Rollout_4HZCJLM5wBk","name_en":"Ab Wheel Rollout","name_es":"Rodada con rueda abdominal (Ab Wheel Rollout)","category":"Core","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Otro","equipment_specific":"Rueda abdominal","muscle_group":"Abdominales","secondary_muscles":["Hombros","Lumbares","Oblicuos"],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Core","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"An exercise that involves rolling out on an ab wheel, engaging the core muscles to stabilize the body and control the movement.","description_es":"Un ejercicio que implica rodar hacia adelante sobre una rueda abdominal, activando los músculos del core para estabilizar el cuerpo y controlar el movimiento.","aliases":["Rollout abdominal","Rueda abdominal"],"tips":["Contrae los abdominales durante todo el movimiento","Exhala al rodar hacia adelante","Mantén el cuerpo recto y rígido"],"common_mistakes":["Arqueamiento excesivo de la espalda","Falta de tensión abdominal","Movimiento descontrolado"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Ab_Wheel_Rollout_4HZCJLM5wBk_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Ab_Wheel_Rollout_4HZCJLM5wBk_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4HZCJLM5wBk","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"10-15","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"},{"id":"Tree_8B5Pz1P_VlE","name_en":"Tree","name_es":"Árbol (Tree)","category":"Mobility","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Peso corporal","muscle_group":"Core","secondary_muscles":["Cuádriceps","Glúteos","Hombros","Isquiotibiales"],"exercise_type":"Funcional","movement_pattern":"Core","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Frontal","training_goal":"Movilidad","description_en":"A standing balance exercise where one foot is placed on the opposite inner thigh or calf with arms extended overhead or in a prayer position.","description_es":"Un ejercicio de equilibrio de pie donde un pie se coloca en el muslo interno opuesto o en la pantorrilla con los brazos extendidos por encima de la cabeza o en posición de oración.","aliases":["Pose de árbol","Postura de árbol"],"tips":["Contrae el abdomen","Mantén la mirada al frente","Respira profundamente"],"common_mistakes":["Arquear la espalda","Mirar hacia abajo","Perder el equilibrio"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Tree_8B5Pz1P_VlE_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Tree_8B5Pz1P_VlE_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8B5Pz1P_VlE","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"12-15","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"}]},{"isGroup":true,"name":"Superserie 2","children":[{"id":"Alternating_Kettlebell_Prone_Row_OD7URB1yHAo","name_en":"Alternating Kettlebell Prone Row","name_es":"Remo alternado en posición prona con kettlebells (Alternating Kettlebell Prone Row)","category":"Pull","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Kettlebell","equipment_specific":"Kettlebells","muscle_group":"Dorsales","secondary_muscles":["Antebrazos","Bíceps","Hombros","Núcleo"],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Pull","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Lie face down on a bench with a kettlebell in each hand. Keeping your core engaged, row one kettlebell at a time up until your elbow is behind your back, then lower it back down and repeat with the opposite arm. Maintain a neutral spine and avoid excessive arching or twisting.","description_es":"Acuéstate boca abajo en un banco con una kettlebell en cada mano. Manteniendo el núcleo activado, realiza un remo con una kettlebell a la vez hasta que tu codo esté detrás de tu espalda, luego bájala y repite con el brazo opuesto. Mantén una columna vertebral neutral y evita arqueamientos o torsiones excesivas.","aliases":["Remo alternado en decúbito prono con kettlebells","Remo prono alternado con kettlebells"],"tips":["Contrae los abdominales","Mantén la mirada hacia abajo","Respira correctamente","Usa un agarre firme"],"common_mistakes":["Arquear la espalda","Girar el torso","Levantar los hombros","Usar demasiado impulso"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Alternating_Kettlebell_Prone_Row_OD7URB1yHAo_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Alternating_Kettlebell_Prone_Row_OD7URB1yHAo_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OD7URB1yHAo","gif_url":null,"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60,"isGroup":false,"weight":"45"},{"id":"Single_Arm_Kettlebell_Front_Rack_Carry_bTxUx8WDxwg","name_en":"Single Arm Kettlebell Front Rack Carry","name_es":"Caminata con Kettlebell en Rack Frontal con un Brazo (Single Arm Kettlebell Front Rack Carry)","category":"Core","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Kettlebell","equipment_specific":"Kettlebell","muscle_group":"Core","secondary_muscles":["Cuádriceps","Glúteos","Hombros","Isquiotibiales"],"exercise_type":"Funcional","movement_pattern":"Gait","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Hold one kettlebell in the front rack position with one arm, keeping your core tight.
